attributes.action: Ensure that any innocent person arrested or charged with a crime is entitled to proper compensation for damages suffered.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Innocent people often suffer significant actual damage if arrested for something they didn't do or even if wrongly charged but not arrested (or released on bail). It can mean loss of earnings, loss of job or financial ruin. 
Provisions for compensating people acquitted or against whom charges are withdrawn have been cancelled. 
This is a flagrant injustice and a clear right to compensation should be established.
